creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
kare@w4.dion.ne.jp
text:
My environment has same problems.(Windows2000 & Linux in Japanese)
The cause of this problem is as the following:

1. On Japanese(or others) environment, SimpleDateFormat#format() returns the 
native language except for ISO-8859-1 in the field of the day.
2. The print() method of BufferedServletOutputStream.java doesn't permit output 
except for ISO-8859-1.

I attached Kazuhiko Kazama's patch fix this problem.

creator: sijaiko@bitex.com
